rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0001
rows.name:
So you guys are a Driver and Blade,
right?

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0002
rows.name:
How well do you actually
get along?

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear that if your Kizuna is at its peak during a battle,
it lets you use a super-duper strong attack!

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But if your Kizuna is really low, your Blade might
not even be able to support you...

rows.label: tlk41100123_01_msg0005
rows.name:
With a bond like me and Sanema have,
we'd be at peak Kizuna all the time! But I guess
it's tough for a Driver and Blade.
